game.title: The Valiant Quest
game.objective: Conquer the Dragon's lair and deliver its scales to the High Mage
game.description: Uncover the dragon's curse and prove your bravery by retrieving its scales from Mount Evershade. Beware of the treacherous paths and powerful magic沿路挑战.

task.description: Steal the dragon's attention by creating a diversion near its lair.
Confront and defeat the fierce guarding dragon to gain access to the cave.
Carefully extract the dragon's scales from its lair and avoid any traps.
Return the scaled to the mage's tower and complete your quest.
